title: Turkish Delights in Berlin (aka Döner für SEX Euro)
desc: In this wry and confronting vignette, a döner kebab vendor meets a parched customer. Beyond the fetishization of ethnicity, the film exploits societal triumphs and insecurities in navigating desire. Fun fact: According to Der Spiegel, the urban myth about döner sauce containing semen may have some “truth” behind it.
